TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebServiceHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 在 Managed 裝載環境中提供 執行個體的處理站，在這個環境中會動態建立主機執行個體以回應傳入訊息。

span.span: A factory that provides instances of in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援動態啟動的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support dynamic activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Service (WAS). 如果您已實作了 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作衍生自 類別的處理站。If you have implemented a custom derivative of , consider also implementing a factory that derives from the class. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何從 衍生類別。The following example shows how to derive a class from . 若要使用您的衍生 Web 服務主機處理站，請在 .SVC 檔案中指定。To have your derived Web service host factory used, specify it in a .SVC file. 下列範例會示範 .svc 檔案中使用的語法。The following example shows the syntax used in a .svc file. ``` <%@ServiceHost language=c# Service="Microsoft.Samples.MyWCFService" Factory="Microsoft.Samples.MyWebServiceHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是直接被呼叫。This method is not called directly. 當動態啟動服務時，就會呼叫這個方法。It is called when a service is being dynamically activated.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 要建立的服務主機類型。

span.span: The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.

summary.span: 使用指定的基底位址，建立指定之 衍生類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the specified derived class with the specified base addresses.
An instance of a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫這個方法，以建立所需的服務主機類型並執行任何必須的處理。Override this method to create the required service host type and perform any needed processing. ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的基本實作。The following example shows a basic implementation of this method.
